enhanced_by.reason: The add method modifies the internal state of the queue, which affects the size calculation.
The remove method modifies the internal state of the queue, which affects the size calculation.
The clear method resets the internal state of the queue, which affects the size calculation.
The isEmpty method relies on the size calculation, making it a good candidate for asserting the size method's correctness.
The isAtFullCapacity method also relies on the size calculation, making it a good candidate for asserting the size method's correctness.
